headline: Could IBM's (IBM) Expanded Straker Partnership Reveal a New Strategic Direction for Its AI Ecosystem?
summary: Straker Limited recently announced it has renewed and expanded its strategic partnership with International Business Machines Corporation, securing a three-year agreement valued at approximately US$28 million, with an option for IBM to extend for another year, focusing on deploying AI-driven translation solutions and building specialized small language models together on IBM Cloud. This renewed collaboration highlights IBM's ongoing commitment to advancing enterprise AI adoption globally,...
